content: I've got first a network failure, and a test timeout again on https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/87402. Do we know if we have outstanding problems with these or should I start looking into how my PR could've affected this?

Those just look like bad luck to me, not related to your PR. Network issues are an unfortunate part of CI. I'd guess the timeout was a noisy neighbor, as it looks like the tail end of building rustc slowed down to a crawl.

You can always check the A-spurious label, but right now there are almost 30 issues tagged :sweat_smile:
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3AA-spurious
